title: Poster, ca. 1965
medium: Offset lithograph on white wove paper
inscribed: Lower left printed in gray: anmeldungen / polizeidepartement / baselstadt [left justification]; printed lower right: Entwurf und Photo: Manfried Maier, Graphikklasse AGS Basel    Druck: Wassermann AG
description: Graphic design incorporating a grainy black and white photographic image of a blurred helmet placed against a series of striated gray bands, and a matte black lower portion with a series of horizontal jagged stripes that appear to be receding toward a horizon line. Across lower section in white letters: die polizei hilft   sie sucht helfer.

tombstone.epitaph:
Poster, ca. 1965.
ca. 1965. Offset lithograph on white wove paper. Gift of Ken Friedman. 1997-19-194.
